page.title: 08Employment-Biddestone area
page.content: A small number are employed on the land. Also a stud farm and sawmills in Biddestone and paper mill at Slaughterford. Building craftsmen,many selfemployed. Three pubs:bar and kitchen staff. Accomodation provided in homes for visitors and students. Domestic work. Village shop,run by owner. Artists and craftsmen find peaceful rural setting conducive to their work. Portrait painter, potter, hand spinner/weaver,graphic designer. At Hartham Park, work is done on testing seeds and fertilizers, employing 60 people from outside area. Majority employed in managerial or professional occupations outside village within half hour's travel. Corsham:Min.of Defence stores, shops and light industry.
